content:
<rule id="quarkus-picocli-00010" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <dependency artifactId="picocli" groupId="info.picocli"/>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <hint category-id="mandatory" effort="1" title="Replace the 'picocli' dependency with Quarkus 'quarkus-picocli' extension">
                    <message>
                        Replace the `info.picocli:picocli` dependency with the Quarkus dependency `io.quarkus:quarkus-picocli`  
                        Further information in the link below.
                    </message>
                    <link href="https://quarkus.io/guides/picocli" title="Quarkus - Guide"/>
                </hint>
            </perform>
        </rule>
